short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create batch alerts for your TradingView Strategy or Indicator with a few clicks. Designed for vyn premium.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically creating an inifinte amount of alerts from any watchlist within TradingView.
At the moment it's only for strategies. Indicator support will be added shortly.
